original_title: Marine Drive Shooting: Four excise personnel arrested
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Four personnel attached to the Excise Department, including an excise inspector, were arrested by Sri Lanka Police over the shooting that took place in Marine Drive, Bambalapitiya on Monday (7) evening.
Sri Lanka Police said that the men were arrested while fleeing in a van after opening fire at a SUV.
The arrests were made when Sri Lanka Police inspected the vehicle during a routine check.
CCTV footage in the area showed a speeding van turning onto Marine Drive, and four men getting out of the vehicle, and a the SUV reversing at high speed.
The four men are seen running after the SUV, and one person opened fire at the SUV.
Sri Lanka Police said that SUV was damaged in the shooting, however, the driver was unharmed.
Sri Lanka Police also seized the pistol assigned to the Excise Inspector that was used in the shooting.
Moreover, the SUV was located by Sri Lanka Police in Wellawatte.
